name: Fast FootBall Shooter
description:
Fast FootBall Shooter - Addictive and hard shooter and shooting game to play .

- There are many FootBall shooting games but ball shooter is one of the best and addictive game.
- It’s kind of a puzzle game.
- It’s not a traditional shooting game in fact it’s a one touch game which is easy to play.
- In this game you have to press the screen with your thumb to shoot the FootBall and your target is to pass the ball from the hurdles.
Now it’s your mind which will decide the right time to press the screen.
Important features of game:
- Easy controls
- One touch game
- High difficulty level
- Puzzle and arcade game
- Beautiful graphics

Thank for play Fast FootBall Shooter
